item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 23, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Fogus: Things and Stuff of 2024 (106 points | 4 comments)

3. Show HN: Keypub.sh – OAuth for the terminal using SSH keys (74 points | 22 comments)
4. Neanderthals cold-adapted? Ribcage reconstruction may hold the answer (22 points | 5 comments)
5. The intricacies of implementing memoization in Ruby (62 points | 26 comments)

10. Building a replacement 386/486 CMOS battery (23 points | 12 comments)
11. Supernovae Evidence for Foundational Change to Cosmological Models (19 points | discuss)

20. Switched Back to Windows After over 10 Years on Linux (20 points | 27 comments)

22. Can AI do maths yet? Thoughts from a mathematician (183 points | 163 comments)
23. Show HN: OwlEars – Raw feedback, straight from your customers' minds (17 points | 24 comments)
24. Why Apple sends spyware victims to this nonprofit security lab (70 points | 25 comments)
25. Twtxt is a decentralised, minimalist microblogging service for hackers (288 points | 101 comments)
26. How bloom filters made SQLite 10x faster (433 points | 79 comments)
27. GPT-5 is behind schedule (513 points | 918 comments)

29. RAG Logger: An Open-Source Alternative to LangSmith (76 points | 13 comments)
30. Decoding the telephony signals in Pink Floyd's 'The Wall' (394 points | 127 comments)
